Game.Name: Ice Age (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It)
Game.plot: Ice Age is a 2D Platformer game, developed by Artificial Mind and Movement and published by Ubisoft, which was released in 2002.http://www.gamefaqs.com/portable/gbadvance/home/546916.htmlCheat: All Stages (+ Bonus Stage & Extended Ending)Go to the Passwords Menu, and type this code: ''NTTTTT''. You should have all the levels with a Golden Acorn. Go to the bonus stage (the one with the gifted bone) and press A to enter. Clear this stage and you get the same ending, but Scrat appears with the words ''The End''.Cheat: All Stages (+ Bonus Stage & Extended Ending)Level 2: PBBQBB Level 3: QBCQBB Level 4: SBFQBB Level 5: DBKQBB Level 6: NBTQBB Level 7: PCTQBB Level 8: RFTQBB Level 9: CKTQBB Level 10: MTTQBB Cheat: All Stages (+ Bonus Stage & Extended Ending)Enter at password screen.Cheat: Unlock scenes from Ice AgeAt the code screen, type in: MFKRPH
Game.Notes: Ice Age makes the jump to the small screen in this Game Boy Advance platformer. Based on events depicted in the motion picture, Ice Age tasks players with guiding both Manny the Mammoth and Sid the Sloth through ten levels of platform-oriented action. Starting out, players control Manny who, along with the human baby Roshan, must navigate a myriad of environments while keeping saber-tooth tigers, hedgehogs, and bees at bay. To do so, Manny is capable of hurling large nuts as makeshift projectiles at any on-screen enemies. Wild animals aren't the only obstacle players will encounter, as they'll need to move a sleeping rhinoceros to advance and inhale skunk fumes to float over dangerous chasms.
